item.title: Meta 在追求规模化人工智能的过程中面临监管审查的风险
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，杰姬-达瓦洛斯（Jackie Davalos）将报道大科技公司在人工智能领域的 "收购-雇佣 "战略，该战略正引起监管机构的严格审查。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Jackie Davalos reports on Big Tech’s “acqui-hire” strategy for artificial intelligence that is drawing scrutiny from regulators.】

item.title: 大科技公司正在给扁平化设计致命一击
item.description:
从 Airbnb 的新应用图标到苹果公司的 "液态玻璃 "设计，拟物化设计又回来了，数字世界中的一切都重新拥有了立体感。【原文：

From Airbnb’s new app icons to Apple’s “Liquid Glass” design, skeuomorphism is back and everything in the digital world has dimensionality again.

】

item.title: 美国企业利润增长为吸收关税提供缓冲
item.description: 我是华盛顿的经济编辑本-霍兰。今天我们将探讨美国企业利润率对通货膨胀的影响。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Ben Holland, an economics editor in Washington. item.description: 简街集团（Jane Street Group）已签约承租恒基兆业地产有限公司（Henderson Land Development Co.【原文：Jane Street Group has signed for six floors in an upcoming tower developed by Henderson Land Development Co. in Hong Kong’s central business district, marking the biggest office deal in the area in decades.】

item.title: 以色列下令暂时关闭最大天然气田
item.description: 以色列能源部表示，以色列下令暂时关闭其最大的天然气田。【原文：Israel ordered its biggest natural gas field to be temporarily shut down, the country’s energy ministry said.】

item.title: 大洋电机总裁称最早将于八月决定退市事宜
item.description: 大洋控股公司将在本月的股东大会后就几家私募股权基金提出的退市建议作出决定，该公司总裁很可能在股东大会上面临下台的投票。【原文：Taiyo Holdings Co. will decide on proposals from several private equity funds to delist it after a shareholder meeting this month, where its president is likely to face a vote on his ouster.】

item.title: 印度航空致命空难使雄心勃勃的扭亏计划面临风险
item.description: 印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）雄心勃勃地计划将自己从一家陈旧的、陷入财务困境的航空公司转变为一家盈利的世界级航空公司，但在十多年来最致命的航空事故之后，这一计划面临着最大的考验。【原文：Air India Ltd.’s ambitious plans to transform itself from a stale, financially troubled carrier into a profitable world-class airline face their biggest test yet after the deadliest aviation accident in more than a decade.】

item.title: 特朗普希望达成协议，伊朗离核武器还有多远？
item.description: 几十年来，伊朗一直因其核野心以及是否正在发展发射原子武器的能力而备受怀疑。【原文：Iran has faced suspicion for decades over its nuclear ambitions and whether it’s developing the capability to fire an atomic weapon.】

item.title: 英国家庭通胀预期在 4 月 CPI 飙升前下降
item.description: 根据英格兰银行在上月消费者价格突然飙升之前进行的一项调查，英国家庭一直预计未来一年的通胀将放缓。【原文：UK households had been expecting inflation to slow over the coming year, according to a Bank of England survey that was conducted before the sudden jump in consumer prices reported last month.】

item.title: 国际米兰将偿还与赞助和媒体版权相关的债券
item.description: 国际米兰足球俱乐部（FC Internazionale Milano SpA）将向以该足球俱乐部的赞助权和媒体权为支持的高收益债券的持有者提前还款。【原文：FC Internazionale Milano SpA is set to give an early payback to holders of its high yield bonds backed by the football club’s sponsorship and media rights.】

item.title: 中国与土耳其续签价值近 50 亿美元的货币互换协议
item.description: 土耳其和中国续签了一项货币互换协议，允许两国央行在未来三年内兑换多达 1,890 亿里拉（48 亿美元）或 350 亿元人民币。【原文：Turkey and China have renewed a currency swap agreement, allowing their central banks to exchange as much as 189 billion liras ($4.8 billion) or 35 billion yuan over the next three years.】

item.title: 首次公开募股前市场 Hiive 寻求新现金，竞争日趋白热化
item.description: Hiive Markets Ltd.是一家风险投资公司股票的在线交易平台，该公司首席执行官表示，希望尽快在今年筹集到多达 1 亿美元的资金。【原文：Hiive Markets Ltd., an online trading platform for shares of venture-backed companies, is hoping to raise as much as $100 million as soon as this year, its chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 随着资产激增至 2,200 亿美元，PSP 在加拿大寻求更多交易
item.description: 加拿大公共部门养老金投资委员会（Public Sector Pension Investment Board）经过多年的全球扩张，已将其投资组合推高至 3,000 亿加元（合 2,200 亿美元），目前正寻求在本国部署更多资金。【原文：Canada’s Public Sector Pension Investment Board is looking to deploy more capital in its home country after years of global expansion that has pushed its investment portfolio to C$300 billion ($220 billion).】

item.title: 经济学家称，美联储至少要到 9 月才会明朗化
item.description: 据彭博新闻社调查的经济学家称，美联储还需要几个月的时间才能清楚地了解特朗普政府的政策变化将如何影响美国经济，因此官员们不太可能在9月之前考虑改变利率。【原文：It will take months yet before the Federal Reserve can get a clear idea of how Trump administration policy changes will shape the US economy, making officials unlikely to consider a change to interest rates before September, according to economists surveyed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 期权预示新兴市场股票的优异表现可能会消失
item.description: 对于美国交易者来说，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战搅动美国 500 指数（S&P 500 Index）之际，发展中国家股票一直是令人惊喜的回报来源。但是，如果期权能提供任何指引，这种超额收益可能很快就会成为过去。【原文：For US traders, developing-country stocks have been a surprising source of returns as Donald Trump’s trade war roiled the S&P 500 Index. But if options are any guide, that outperformance may soon be a thing of the past.】

item.title: 北欧两家首次公开募股公司早盘交易价格飙升至发行价以上
item.description: 上周五，北欧地区两家首次公开募股公司的交易价格大幅高于其发行价，巩固了该地区首次公开募股强劲的趋势。【原文：Two initial public offerings in the Nordics traded substantially above their offer prices on Friday, cementing a trend of strong debuts in the region.】

item.title: 玻利维亚骚乱不断，美元危机导致通胀飙升
item.description: 在拉巴斯黎明前寒冷的几个小时里，伊丽莎白-桑切斯（Elizabeth Sánchez）在玻利维亚一家国营杂货店外排队，希望能买到两瓶植物油。【原文：In the chilly hours before dawn in La Paz, Elizabeth Sánchez was queuing outside a Bolivian state-run grocery store, hoping to get her hands on two bottles of vegetable oil.】

item.title: 罢工和美元危机使玻利维亚通货膨胀率创历史新高
item.description: 在拉巴斯黎明前的寒冷时刻，伊丽莎白-桑切斯（Elizabeth Sanchez）在一家国营商店外排队，希望能买到两瓶植物油。【原文：En las frías horas previas al amanecer en La Paz, Elizabeth Sánchez hacía fila frente a una tienda estatal con la esperanza de conseguir dos botellas de aceite vegetal.】

item.title: 美国银行称美国股票基金遭遇 11 周来最大资金外流
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）公布的数据显示，美国股票基金遭遇了近三个月来最大的资金外流，这使得股市涨势停滞的迹象更加明显。【原文：US stock funds suffered the biggest outflows in almost three months, according to data published by Bank of America Corp., adding to signs that the equity market rally is stalling.】

item.title: 中国 5 月信贷扩张、新增贷款增幅低于预期
item.description: 中国 5 月份信贷扩张速度低于预期，新增贷款也低于预期。【原文：China’s credit expanded at a slower than expected pace in May, with new loans also falling short of estimates.】

item.title: 诺和诺德超越 SAP 成为欧洲最有价值公司
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）超越软件开发商 SAP SE，蝉联欧洲最有价值上市公司。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S reclaimed its position as Europe’s most valuable public company, overtaking software developer SAP SE.】

item.description: 在以色列对伊朗发动空袭，导致该地区一些国家关闭领空之后，穿越中东地区的航空公司面临着新的挑战。【原文：Airlines traversing the Mideast face new challenges after Israel launched air strikes against Iran, leading a number of countries in the region to close their airspace.】

item.title: 特朗普经济顾问米兰淡化 "报复税 "对投资影响的担忧
item.description: 白宫首席经济学家驳斥了有关唐纳德-特朗普总统的税收和支出法案中一项有争议的条款会赶走外国债券投资者的担忧，称这种担忧是 "误读"。【原文：The White House’s chief economist dismissed concerns that a controversial provision in President Donald Trump’s tax-and-spending bill would drive away foreign bond investors, calling such fears a “misinterpretation.”】

item.title: 汇业银行发放亚太地区年度最大并购贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，澳大利亚软件开发商 WiseTech Global Ltd. 的贷款人正在为该公司收购美国供应链软件平台 E2open Parent Holdings Inc.【原文：Lenders to Australian software developer WiseTech Global Ltd. are syndicating a $3 billion loan backing its acquisition of US-based supply chain software platform E2open Parent Holdings Inc, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 油轮运营商对中东货物 "更加犹豫不决
item.description: 世界上最大的油轮运营商之一 Frontline Ltd. 在以色列对伊朗进行了一夜的空袭后，对是否提供船只从波斯湾运输货物 "更加犹豫不决"。【原文：Frontline Ltd., one of the world’s largest oil-tanker operators, is “far more hesitant” about offering its vessels to haul cargoes from the Persian Gulf following overnight airstrikes on Iran by Israel.】

item.title: 新世界 110 亿美元的再融资计划必须获得 100% 的支持
item.description: 随着陷入困境的香港建筑商新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：As distressed Hong Kong builder New World Development Co. gathers more support from banks for its targeted HK$87.5 billion ($11.1 billion) loan refinancing, a key part of the terms shows that it must get 100% in commitments, or the deal will fall through.】
